channel.title: Chaoya Li's Blog
channel.description: Recent content on Chaoya Li's Blog

item.title: About
item.description: Hi, I’m Chaoya Li, a little hacker living in Taizhou, China. I got bachelor’s and master’s degrees in computer science from Zhejiang University. I have worked for Netease and Alibaba for several years. Now I’m in a small start-up company, trying hard to make value for our customers. I love coding, writing and music.

item.title: 自动微分简介
item.description: 什么是自动微分 在数值优化算法中，经常需要用到函数的导数。为了计算出一个函数的导数，通常有两种方法： 符号微分（Symbolic Diferent
